it.polimi.se2018.network.server

Interface ServerController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Server

    public interface ServerController
    Interface based on the Abstract Factory Design Pattern. This interface is used as server controller in AbstractServer. Implemented by Server class in order to provide basic methods for RMI and Socket Server.
    Author:
    DavideMammarella

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean login(RemotePlayer remotePlayer)
      Remote method used to log the user to the server with his nickname.
      void ping()
      Remote method used to ping the client.
      RemotePlayer searchPlayerById(int id)
      Searcher for player id in the game.
      void sendEventToController(EventController eventController)
      Remote method used to send to the server a request to unleash an event.
      void sendEventToView(EventView eventClient)
      Remote method used to send to the client an update of the game.
      void startGame()
      Remote method used to start the game.

    • Method Detail

      • login

        boolean login(RemotePlayer remotePlayer)
       throws PlayerNetworkException
        Remote method used to log the user to the server with his nickname.
        Parameters:
        remotePlayer - reference to RMI or Socket Player.
        Returns:
        true if the user is logged, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        PlayerNetworkException

      • sendEventToController

        void sendEventToController(EventController eventController)
        Remote method used to send to the server a request to unleash an event.
        Parameters:
        eventController - object that will use the server to unleash the event associated.

      • startGame

        void startGame()
        Remote method used to start the game.

      • sendEventToView

        void sendEventToView(EventView eventClient)
        Remote method used to send to the client an update of the game.
        Parameters:
        eventClient - object that will use the client to unleash the update associated.

      • ping

        void ping()
        Remote method used to ping the client.

      • searchPlayerById

        RemotePlayer searchPlayerById(int id)
        Searcher for player id in the game.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the player associated to the client.
        Returns:
        player associated to the ID.
